categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Voralla Morbo was female Human who owned the Thyferran cantina Morbo's Place. She was sympathetic to the Rebellion, helping transport bacta and keeping a docking bay clear for them.
She had a history with Han Solo after a shipment of Norvanian grog went undelivered, and slugged him at the end of the mission to Thyferra.
She passed on information about an Imperial plot using contaminated bacta on Delrakkin.
She wore dark green coveralls and high boots, and wore her hair short.
